actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to modify the Crater-Long Lakes division of the Snettisham project, Alaska, with respect to the terms and period of amortization of the capital investment of the United States in such project.

summary.text: Provides for the modification of the Crater-Long Lakes division of the Snettisham project, Alaska, with respect to the terms and periods of amortization of the capital investment of the United States in such project.

titles.title: A bill to modify the Crater-Long Lakes division of the Snettisham project, Alaska, with respect to the terms and period of amortization of the capital investment of the United States in such project.
